name: The Bright Side of the Bigger Picture
name_original: The Bright Side of the Bigger Picture
description:
Music: “Blue Afternoon”, from PlayOnLoop.com
Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

The theme for this game jam was: You. I portrayed and shared a few important strengths that I have and would be really important for other people to have. This game took me 2 hours and 41 minutes to make and I hope you guys enjoy it!

Keys: 

W - Move up

S - Move down

A - Move left

D - Move right

The bird asset, rainbow asset, and programming was done by me

Credit to: https://www.piskelapp.com/  The place I used to make the assets.

Credit to Unity Assets:  Casual Game Sounds - DUSTYROOM  , Fantasy Wooden GUI - Black Hammer, Too Cube Forest - Nemo - MK2, Free Pixel Font: Thaleah - Tiny Worlds
